model.agent
Class Agent

java.lang.Object
  model.agent.Agent
All Implemented Interfaces:
AgentMutable, AgentViewable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyAgent, IndexAgent, MenuAgent, SearchAgent, StatsAgent
public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgentMutable

This abstract class implements the AgentView interface, and must be extended by every agent implementation.

Author:
Gijs B. Roest
